# custom

**Type Property**

Does not apply any system effect when selected.

## Declaration

```swift
static let custom: PaletteSelectionEffect
```

## Discussion



## Getting palette selection effects

- **automatic**: Applies the system’s default effect when selected.
- **symbolVariant(_:)**: Applies the specified symbol variant when selected.

items.description: Applies the system’s default effect when selected.
items.name: automatic

items.description: Applies the specified symbol variant when selected.
items.name: symbolVariant(_:)
